recipesJson.name: Black Dragon Cake
recipesJson.author: MopHead
recipesJson.description: This one is hard to describe, It's main profile comes from the blackberry, but the dragonfruit adds some sweetness and close to a strawberry flavor. The cake profile is light, with hints of vanilla. Then topped off with the cream cheese icing to give some added sweetness and frosting.

reviews.text: I just keep coming back to this recipe. Light fluffy cake with a strong blackberry bite. Almost like a blackberry jam between cake layers.
